Function reference

All functions

Add an administration to a nif object

Attach a time mapping to an sdtm object

Add treatment day ('TRTDY') column

BMI by age scatterplot
clip_nif()
Reduce a NIF object on the subject level by excluding all administrations after the last observation
cmt_mapping()
Analyte - compartment mapping
compress()
Compress a NIF object
compress_nif()
This function removes columns from a NIF object that are not needed for downstream analysis

Decompose DTC field into date and time components

Keep only selected USUBJID in the data set
